Articles.Content:
....if I jacked up my product, then decided to take a months vacation. Welcome to the real world. My latest experience with "moderation" is enough. "Topic closed" because of a realistic complaint? w/e.. Keep your forum, and your game. Am I salty? You can bet your *** I am.  complaints are closed so they can be buried with new posts. We all know the trick .. There, moderate that. I'm out. I'll make sure I leave an adequate review. .

Edited May 22, 2016 by Talavar

It was closed because the question was answered. It wasn't closed because of any broken rules. There's no need to get mad over ONE post. I have had many threads closed, posts deleted, and quite a few infractions. It's not terrible. Just pretend like you never posted it.

i'd give this topic 1h at last

But well, I guess u would be more successfull to be listened to on Reddit since most of the other "worried"-ones are there already

i would agree but im too scared to agree. so, ill just whistle quietly in the corner.

Edited May 22, 2016 by AlamoVampire

43 minutes ago, HoloYolo said:

It was closed because the question was answered. It wasn't closed because of any broken rules. There's no need to get mad over ONE post. I have had many threads closed, posts deleted, and quite a few infractions. It's not terrible. Just pretend like you never posted it.

 That's a crock.. There's a lot of posts directly around mine that had already been answered.. they aren't closed... I wonder why that is?.... (rhetorical)

Edited May 22, 2016 by Talavar
I have posted many things that had been locked; all of them criticizing SQUAD. They have all been locked because everyone was starting to insult each other. I don't know what you are saying

See...you see!! THIS is what happens to perfectly sane people when you take a perfectly working wheel system...

 

Then replace it with 100 different sliders and settings..and 1000 more ways for them to explode

And no way to make them like before..atleast not stock

 

 

I built a train today from a puma rover..

 

It shook itself to bits on the runway doing the harlem shake...

Why? Because the physics of the world changed and sane things no longer work

 

Thus

 

Everyones sadness..false hopes and derailed hype trains funneled into this guy..an avatar of displeasure.. A skin of evil looking for another tasha yarr..

In other news.. Trains are awesome

Ive got no idea if wheels are his problem

 

But they are mine and I didnt want to start a thread

 

I had no idea the kind of personal impact that the Kerbal Train Program, with its culture..lore..sadness and hope, had in my life

 

 

Until an update made it useless .

Colour me sad

 

 

 

 

Edited May 22, 2016 by Overland

<peeks out from his corner> The system is borked badly, yes it is. It needs major work, that it does. The fact that these issues have gotten to where they are <not that I am defending anything here, that I am not> is a good sign they are over worked, that they are. Rest is what was needed to bring fresh eyes into this to fix this unholy mess we have here. Now with vacation looking like it is over, fix this they can, that they must. Or more avatars and skins of evil will come forth, that they will, yes indeed.
topic closed (imagine the irony) for discussing of moderator actions in public (rule 3.4).
